entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 5:22 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NNE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow changing to 70 percent chance of light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Overcast. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
